name: Fragment: ÆLSE
description:
ÆLSE is a simple 2D survival game designed to be a slow and meditative experience. Collect bonuses, eliminate enemies and survive as long as you want.

This Fragment has a possibility to be expanded in a future.

Game will run in borderless mode and will use your desktop resolution and refresh rate.

System requirements:

  • Windows PC that can run UE4 on low settings
  • ~300 Mb free disk space
